title: France panorama. [No. 72/38]
brief_description: French cinemagazines items including: 1. A vehicle for the city - experimental use of 20 electric minicars in the city of Dijon. 2. Adzac’s art - relief and hollow casting sculpture. 3. Festival at Arles - the old town of Arles, heart of Provence and the Camargue: The dance - Requiem in Arles by the Ballet Theatre Contemporain; Presence of Camargue - photo show on the Camargue theme; The Theater - the Arcady Company performs “Solomon the Magnificent”; Picasso donation - new Picasso canvases at the Roattu Museum; The modern dance - “hiphop” with scenography by Cesar.
